title: Y
data:
==Commands==
*Pressing '''y''' will [[movement|move]] your character one square up and to the left.
*Pressing '''shift+y''' will move you in this direction until you encounter a [[monster]] or something else interesting

==Symbols==
While playing in console mode:
*'''y''' represents flying insects such as [[vampire mosquito | mosquitos]].
*'''Y''' represents [[yak]]s and [[elephant]]s.
